title: T205 Graded Cards for Sale - Reduced!

posts.post_title: T205 Graded Cards for Sale - Reduced!
posts.post_content:
I have the following T205 graded cards for sale.  Prices include shipping.  Payment by Paypal or mailed payment is acceptable.  Please reserve at [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url] .

John Bates PSA 3 VG - $35
Jake Daubert SGC 40 VG - $35
Mike Doolan GAI 4.5 VGEX+ - $40
Wilber Goode SGC 40 VG - $35
Jack Knight PSA 3 VG - $35
Arlie Latham (A. Latham on back) PSA 4 VGEX - $45
Sherrie Magee SGC 50 VGEX - (Sweet Cap Black Factory 42) - SOLD
Fred Merkle SGC 30 VG - $35
Barney Pelty SGC 40 VG - $35
Jimmy Sheckard BVG 3.5 VG+ - $38
Lee Tannehill SGC 50 VGEX - SOLD
